description:
Yuzu is an innocent and loving foxgirl who has grown up with a http://anidb.net/ch91585 [nun], and just arrived at Konohanatei to expand her horizons. She has great respect for everyone around her, but takes a particular liking to http://anidb.net/ch90643 [Satsuki]. A healing character, she brightens up the visitors` days.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Yuzu
